mapper.select: select distinct u5.ua_id,u5.authority_name,u5.authority_url,u5.authority_desc from user_info u1,ui_ur_relation u2,user_role u3,ur_ua_relation u4,user_authority u5 where u2.ui_id=#{user_id} and u2.ur_id=u3.role_id and u3.role_id=u4.ur_id and u4.ua_id=u5.ua_id

select user_account,user_name,user_certificaiton_num,user_company,user_phone_num,user_email,to_char(user_birthdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as user_birthdate,decode(user_sex,1,'男',0,'女','男') as user_sex,decode(user_account_state,1,'启用',0,'未启用','未启用') as user_account_state from user_info where user_id=#{user_id}
select a3.role_name from user_info a1,ui_ur_relation a2,user_role a3 where a1.user_id=a2.ui_id and a2.ur_id=a3.role_id and a1.user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: update user_info set user_password=#{1} where user_id=#{0} and user_password=#{2}
